name: wnba-led-scoreboard
description: Multi-league LED scoreboard with web admin

scripts.test: npm run test:python && npm run test:web
scripts.test:python: python -m coverage run -m unittest discover tests -q && python -m coverage report
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:python && npm run test:web:coverage
scripts.test:all: npm run test:python && cd web-admin && npm run test:ci
scripts.install:all: pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install coverage && cd web-admin && npm ci
scripts.clean: make clean && cd web-admin && rm -rf .next node_modules

author: Steve Bargelt
